Instructions.Value: Not designed for traditional combat, the Carrier is a force multiplier. Designed to support allies from range, the Carrier can hang back behind friendly lines where it's lack of armor isn't a concern. Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Movement: 5/8 Hex: 150/240 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 80 20 Left 70 20 Right 70 20 Rear 60 20 Turret 80 20 Total 360 100
